nodes.text: Togatto Speedway was a podracing arena located in the tropical city of Nurrale on the planet Esseles. Owned by Luthus Ferlani and his family, it was considered the single most spectacular sporting arena in the Darpa sector of the galaxy during the waning years of the Old Republic. The arena hosted the Annual Jatzday Race as well as several other lesser-known events. The track itself was well known for its hairpin turns and torturous spirals.
